headlineTxt: Oct 06, 2021, 08:30 ETAugmented Reality Leveraging AI to Engage 200 Million Active Users by 2026often critical AR capabilities to market."While machine vision isn't inherently required for augmented reality—in the case of assisted reality hardware and applications—it is increasingly becoming a necessity for most use cases.
